recoursemech: For Human Resources Data: If the employee has questions or concerns regarding this Policy or the use of your personal information, they are encouraged to contact their local Human Resources manager. If the employee feels the matter has not been adequately addressed by this person, he/she may bring their complaint to Esterline’s Data Protection Committee, formed to resolve employee privacy issues. The employee should contact the Data Pro at DPO@esterline.com to get more information on how to contact the Data Protection Committee. Decisions by the internal committee are subject to review by EU Data Protection Authorities (DPA) or the authorities of the nation subject to the EU Data Protection Directive. Upon request by an employee, the DPA or local authorities may investigate the employee’s concerns, and advise Esterline on steps to solve any identified problem.
